attributes.action: Free prescriptions for cystic fibrosis patients
attributes.additional_details: Cystic Fibrosis is a terminal illness which requires a lot of medication and treatment. People with Cystic Fibrosis should not have to pay for prescriptions as they require a lot on their prescription and it costs a fortune. Cystic Fibrosis affects the lungs, pancreas, liver and other things such as the gallbladder and sometimes the heart. It can cause infertility and diabetes. Cystic Fibrosis is a life threatening illness which requires long term treatments such as physiotherapy, taking lots of medications and hospitalisations, Cystic Fibrosis patients also require a high fat and high calorie diet, which costs enough without making them pay for prescriptions as well!
